TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyleCollection

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> class represents the collection of all the styles used to describe the columns in an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
## Examples The following example shows how to set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection>. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 Add(class System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle columnStyle) cil managed

Docs.returns: The position into which the new element was inserted.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.Add%2A> method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.IndexOf%2A> method begins searching at the first element of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> and ends either when it finds a match or it reaches the last element.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Insert (int index, System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle columnStyle);
.method public hidebysig instance void Insert(int32 index, class System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle columnStyle) cil managed

Docs.param: The zero-based index at which should be inserted.
Docs.summary: Inserts a into the at the specified position.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.Insert%2A> method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.
In collections of contiguous elements, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> class, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the inserted element. The indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.

Docs.param: The to remove from the . The value can be .
Docs.summary: Removes the first occurrence of a specific from the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.Remove%2A> method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
In collections of contiguous elements, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> class, the elements that follow the deletion point move up to occupy the vacated spot. The indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
